LanguageData.SSBlitz_Zest.label: Blitz (Zest)
LanguageData.SSBlitz_Zest.description: A psychoid infused and highly sweetened drink. This drink has a fruit flavouring. Active for about half a day.
LanguageData.SSBlitz_Ice.label: Blitz (Ice)
LanguageData.SSBlitz_Ice.description: A psychoid infused and highly sweetened drink. This drink has a mint flavouring. Active for about half a day.
